New-York Historical Society
Fred Brunckhurst citizenship certificate
New York (State). Court of Common Pleas (City and County of New York)
AHMC Brunckhurst, Fred
.01 Linear feet in one folder
1888 April 25 Citizenship certificate issued from the Court of Common Pleas for the City and County of New York granting Fred Brunckhurst citizenship of the United States of America. Dated April 25, 1888. For more information and to request this item, see the catalog record, or write to manuscripts@nyhistory.org.
